curam.util.dataaccess

Class StandardReadmultiOperation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.dataaccess.ReadmultiOperation<T>
      • curam.util.dataaccess.StandardReadmultiOperation<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the result set row
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeferredInstanceErrorListSize

    public class StandardReadmultiOperation<T>
extends ReadmultiOperation<T>
    StandardReadmultiOperation is the ReadmultiOperation subclass used by the Curam infrastructure to assemble database result sets into arrays for returning from entity readmulti operations.
    See Also:
    ReadmultiOperation

    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardReadmultiOperation

        public StandardReadmultiOperation(int maximum,
                                  ValueList<T> dtls,
                                  boolean requireInformational)
                           throws ReadmultiMaxException
        StandardReadmultiOperation constructor.
        Parameters:
        maximum - The maximum number of records to be returned by this readmulti operation.
        dtls - The column values of the result row
        requireInformational - Indicator as to whether an informational is required readmulti maximum is reached.
        Throws:
        ReadmultiMaxException - if more than the maximum records are returned

      • onMaximumReached

        public void onMaximumReached()
                      throws InformationalException,
                             ReadmultiMaxException
        Behavior required when the maximum numbers of records have been reached. If the informationalRequired parameter has been set in the constructor of this Operation an InformationalMessage will be added to the current transactions InformationalManager. For testing purposes, if the informationalRequired parameter has not been set and the curam.test.treatreadmultimaxaserror is set to true a ReadmultiMaxException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        onMaximumReached in class ReadmultiOperation<T>
        Throws:
        InformationalException - RUN_ID_READMULTI_MAX - if the indicator on the constructor has been set.
        ReadmultiMaxException - ReadmultiMaxException - if the test property curam.test.treatreadmultimaxaserror is set to true

      • getResult

        public ValueList<T> getResult()
        Return results array.
        Returns:
        results array
